title: Első üzenet
content: <paper-textarea label='Text'>{{item.value}}</paper-textarea></template><template is='dom-if' if='{{isVideoSection(item)}}'><google-youtube video-id$='{{item.value}}' rel='0' start='5' autoplay='1'></google-youtube></template><template is='dom-if' if='{{isImageSection(item)}}'><iron-image src$='{{item.value}}'></iron-image>
